description.translate: An exquisite agility, like the most worthy elite there is.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§6Rojolion ganth S\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Une agilité des plus exquises, \"}","{\"text\":\"§7à l'instar de la plus digne élite qui soit.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7An exquisite agility, like the most\"}","{\"text\":\"§7worthy elite there is.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a4 §7HAS§a2 §7HUN§a1\"}"]}}
